Description: FullContact can enhance the information you have on a contact with details from social media.
Name: FullContact

Methods.Name: Enrich Lookup Company by Domain (v3)
Methods.Description: Finds more information about an organisation from a Domain.

MetaDescription: Let your users enhance their data as it enters your application with our FullContact integration
Content: Create template automations between your application and FullContact to allow your users to enhance their data as it reaches your system, helping improve CRM, Email marketing and help desk data.
